definition: oil/fat/grease/petroleum/to apply tung oil, paint or varnish/oily/greasy/glib/cunning
sour/tart/sick at heart/grieved/sore/aching/pedantic/impractical/to make sarcastic remarks about sb/an acid

sentences.english: Ascorbyl oleic acid ester is a good kind of antioxidant.
sentences.chinese: 抗壞血酸油酸酯具有強抗氧化作用。

sentences.english: Objective To optimize the enrichment method of linoleic acid in sunflower oil.
sentences.chinese: 目的優選尿素包合法富集葵花油中亞油酸的方法。

sentences.english: The prospect of CLA production by bioconversion methods on industrial scale is also elucida…
sentences.chinese: 並簡述了生物法工業化生產共軛亞油酸的前景。

sentences.english: Oleic-Linoleic Acids Fats in this group are the most abundant .
sentences.chinese: 油亞油酸這類脂肪是最豐富的。

sentences.english: Under the optimum conditions, the average conversion rate of CLA could exceed 96.8%.
sentences.chinese: 在此條件下，亞油酸的平均轉化率超過96%。

sentences.english: Dissolvability is good with various kinds of oleic acid, high brilliance, and faster dry ability.
sentences.chinese: 與多種油酸相溶性好，光澤高，乾燥快。

sentences.english: The selection for big seed of soybean could be creased oleic acid and decreased linolenic acid.
sentences.chinese: 大粒化選擇可以提高油酸含量降低亞麻酸含量。

sentences.english: The flavonoid of tartary buckwheat showed different antioxidant effects in lard and linoleic acid.
sentences.chinese: 苦蕎黃酮對豬油和亞油酸所起的抗氧化效果不同。

sentences.english: The invention relates to application of ethyl linoleate to prevention and treatment of pine wilt diseases.
sentences.chinese: 本發明涉及亞油酸乙酯在松材線蟲病防治中的應用。

sentences.english: Splitting and flaking of nails may be due to a lack of linoleic acid.
sentences.chinese: 分裂和剝落的指甲可能是由於缺乏亞油酸。

sentences.english: The flavonoid of tartary buckwheat with different components proved to be an excellent synergistic antioxidant in linoleic acid system.
sentences.chinese: 在亞油酸體系中，苦蕎黃酮各組分協同抗氧化效果好。

sentences.english: Take conjugated linoleic acid capsules every day.
sentences.chinese: 每天喫點共軛亞油酸膠囊。

sentences.english: For the general heritability, maternal and cytoplasm heritabilities were the main components for palmitic, oleic and linolenic acids contents.
sentences.chinese: 棕櫚酸含量和油酸含量是以普通狹義遺傳率爲主。

sentences.english: Unsaturated fatty acid, especially linoleic are enriched in sunflower seed oil .
sentences.chinese: 葵花油中富含不飽和脂肪酸，尤其是亞油酸。

sentences.english: The butyl oleate was synthesized with Ti(SO4)2/C as catalyst.
sentences.chinese: 以活性炭負載硫酸鈦作催化劑，催化合成油酸丁酯。

sentences.english: Sesame seeds contain around 50% of an oil rich in Oleic and Linoleic Acid.
sentences.chinese: 芝麻的含油量高達50%左右，富含油酸和亞油酸。
